thread.title: Neiman Marcus CEO to Step Aside

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Neiman Marcus CEO to Step Aside

organizations.name: step aside neiman marcus group ltd.

text:
Neiman Marcus Group Ltd., the luxury retailer saddled with debt from two leveraged buyouts, is preparing to appoint a new chief executive, according to people familiar with the situation.
Karen Katz, a Neiman lifer who has served as CEO and president since 2010, is stepping aside and will be replaced by an outsider, the people said, declining... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
